title: Finance is central for the equitable recovery from the COVID-19 pandemic - World Bank Group
content: Finance is central for the equitable recovery from the COVID-19 pandemic  World Bank Group
description: New 2022 World Development Report: Finance for an Equitable Recovery examines the central role finance plays in the economic recovery from COVID19, so that everyone, including vulnerable groups such as poor adults, women, and small businesses, are able to recover.
